pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro puriso pavāsaṃ gacchanto pajāpatiṃ etadavoca—“suttaṃ dhārayitvā amukassa tantavāyassa dehi, cīvaraṃ vāyāpetvā nikkhipa,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.4: Assosi kho aññataro piṇḍacāriko bhikkhu tassa purisassa imaṃ vācaṃ bhāsamānassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.5: Atha kho so bhikkhu yenāyasmā upanando sakyaputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—“mahāpuññosi tvaṃ, āvuso upananda,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.6: amukasmiṃ okāse aññataro puriso pavāsaṃ gacchanto pajāpatiṃ etadavoca—‘suttaṃ dhārayitvā amukassa tantavāyassa dehi, cīvaraṃ vāyāpetvā nikkhipa, āgato ayyaṃ upanandaṃ cīvarena acchādessāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.8: Sopi kho tantavāyo āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa upaṭṭhāko hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.9: Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto yena so tantavāyo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ tantavāyaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.10: “idaṃ kho, āvuso, cīvaraṃ maṃ uddissa viyyati; āyatañca karohi vitthatañca. Appitañca suvītañca suppavāyitañca suvilekhitañca suvitacchitañca karohī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.11: “Ete kho me, bhante, suttaṃ dhārayitvā adaṃsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.13: “Na, bhante, sakkā āyataṃ vā vitthataṃ vā appitaṃ vā kātuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.14: Sakkā ca kho, bhante, suvītañca suppavāyitañca suvilekhitañca suvitacchitañca kātun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.15: “Iṅgha tvaṃ, āvuso, āyatañca karohi vitthatañca appitañca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.17: Atha kho so tantavāyo yathābhataṃ suttaṃ tante upanetvā yena sā itthī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ itthiṃ etadavoca—“suttena, ayye, attho”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.18: “Nanu tvaṃ ayyo mayā vutto—‘iminā suttena cīvaraṃ vināhī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.19: “Saccāhaṃ, ayye, tayā vutto—‘iminā suttena cīvaraṃ vināhī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.20: Api ca maṃ ayyo upanando evamāha—‘iṅgha tvaṃ, āvuso, āyatañca karohi vitthatañca appitañca,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.22: Atha kho sā itthī yattakaṃyeva suttaṃ paṭhamaṃ adāsi tattakaṃ pacchā adāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.23: Assosi kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto—“so kira puriso pavāsato āgato”ti. Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto yena tassa purisassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.24: Atha kho so puriso yenāyasmā upanando sakyaputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.25: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so puriso pajāpatiṃ etadavoca—“vītaṃ taṃ cīvaran”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.28: Atha kho sā itthī taṃ cīvaraṃ nīharitvā sāmikassa datvā etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.29: Atha kho so puriso āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa cīvaraṃ datvā ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.32: Kathañhi nāma ayyo upanando mayā pubbe appavārito tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.33: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tassa purisassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.34: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.35: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.36: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.37: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, upananda, pubbe appavārito gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.41: “Aññātako, moghapurisa, aññātakassa na jānāti patirūpaṃ vā appatirūpaṃ vā santaṃ vā asantaṃ vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.42: Tattha nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, pubbe appavārito aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.44: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.45: “Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissa aññātako gahapati vā gahapatānī vā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpeyya, tatra ce so bhikkhu pubbe appavārito tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.46: ‘idaṃ kho, āvuso, cīvaraṃ maṃ uddissa viyyati. Āyatañca karotha vitthatañca. Appitañca suvītañca suppavāyitañca suvilekhitañca suvitacchitañca karotha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.47: Appeva nāma mayampi āyasmantānaṃ kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyyāmā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:1.48: Evañca so bhikkhu vatvā kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyya antamaso piṇḍapātamattampi, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:2.2: bhikkhussatthāya bhikkhuṃ ārammaṇaṃ karitvā bhikkhuṃ acchādetukāmo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:2.4: mātito vā pitito vā yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā asambaddho.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:2.12: channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ vikappanupagaṃ pacchimaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:2.16: yaṃ bhikkhuṃ uddissa cīvaraṃ viyyati so bhikkhu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:2.18: pubbe avutto hoti— “kīdisena te, bhante, cīvarena attho, kīdisaṃ te cīvaraṃ vāyāpemī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:2.22: “idaṃ kho, āvuso, cīvaraṃ maṃ uddissa viyyati, āyatañca karotha vitthatañca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:2.23: Appitañca suvītañca suppavāyitañca suvilekhitañca suvitacchitañca karotha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:2.24: Appeva nāma mayampi āyasmantānaṃ kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:2.25: Evañca so bhikkhu vatvā kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyya antamaso piṇḍapātamattampīti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:2.27: yāgupi bhattampi khādanīyampi cuṇṇapiṇḍopi dantakaṭṭhampi dasikasuttampi, antamaso dhammampi bhaṇati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:2.28: Tassa vacanena āyataṃ vā vitthataṃ vā appitaṃ vā karoti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:2.30: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:2.33: “idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ pubbe appavārito aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpannaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:2.38: Aññātake aññātakasaññī pubbe appavārito gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjati, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:2.39: Aññātake vematiko pubbe appavārito gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjati, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:2.40: Aññātake ñātakasaññī pubbe appavārito gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjati, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
